text: Luis Lusquiños (27 November 1951 – 17 June 2017) was an Argentine politician. He was born in the San Luis Province. He had the highest number of absences in the 2005-2009 period.Luis Lusquiños nunca fue a trabajar He was appointed Chief of the Cabinet of Ministers during the brief presidency of Adolfo Rodríguez Saá.Armó el gabinete con intención de seguir Lusquiños died on 17 June 2017 at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Argentine politicians Category:San Luis Province
title: Luis Lusquiños
